refsect1.title: Configuration Files
refsect1.para: The following configuration files are searched (in this order, from lowest to highest):

listitem.para: User-specific configuration file. If $XDG_CONFIG_HOME is not set or empty, $HOME/.config/docmanager/docmanager.conf will be used.

refsect1.para: If no --config option was given, &progname; will read all of these files that are available in the listed order above. Files which are not available will be ignored.
The files are read in the order given above, with last value found taking precedence over values read earlier.

refsect2.title: Syntax
refsect2.para: The &progname; configuration file uses the INI format, for example:
refsect2.screen: [general] # General options, used for all subcommands foo=bar
refsect2.para: The general section contains an entry with the name foo and its value bar.
